amendment.description: To declare that it is the policy of the United States to continue to support implementation of United Nations Security Council Resolution 1172 (1998).

vote.text: Amendment SA 5178 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 27 - 71. Record Vote Number: 266.

action.text: Amendment SA 5178 proposed by Senator Dorgan. (consideration: CR S11001-11002, S11006, S11009; text: CR S11001; text as modified: CR S11006) To declare that it is the policy of the United States to continue to support implementation of United Nations Security Council Resolution 1172 (1998).
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 5178 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 27 - 71. Record Vote Number: 266.
